Nov. 30, 1957 D SWBBA Contest (Championship Section)
SWBBA Contest (Championship Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest South West BBA Annual Championships swbba-contest-championship-section
Queen's Theatre, Barnstaple, Devon, England, UK Hymn tune contest in conjunction with section 2 - 1st Burnham and Highbridge. Best instrumentalist - cornet of Burnham and Highbridge. 4 bands competed.
Aug. 15, 2013, 9:55 a.m. Aug. 15, 2013, 10:08 a.m.
1 Bodmin Town Band W. D. Lawton
2 Wincanton Junior R. W. Gilham
3 Burnham & Highbridge R. H. Reynolds
4 Bideford Town Band Unknown
